model.shaders.entity

Class EntityShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.shaders.ShaderProgram
      • model.shaders.entity.EntityShader

  • public class EntityShader
extends ShaderProgram
    Class to handle the open GL bindings for the entity shader program
    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949
